content: the jayda tee is a lightweight and fun summer crochet top with a gorgeous square neckline and ribbing trim this project is worked from the bottom up in the round and then split into two panels worked in row to create the armholes sleeves and trim are added at the end be sure to grab the ** jayda cardigan 1 ** crochet pattern too pattern difficulty intermediate yarn wecrochet hawthorne fingering speckle hand painted sizing and approximate yardage xs 28-30 870 s 32-34 980 m 36-38 1088 l 40-42 1197 xl 44-46 1306 2x 48-50 1414 3x 52-54 1523 4x 56-58 1632 5x 60-62 1741 all of my patterns are thoroughly tested by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns once they have been downloaded however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns ** new to crocheting garments or need some extra help with them sign up for the free ultimate guide to crocheting garments email series 2 ** you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/jayda-cardigan 2 https //www subscribepage com/crochetinggarmentsguide
